scripts.update-rhu: npm run --prefix ../../RHU build && npx rimraf js3party/rhu/ && npx copyfiles -u 4 ../../RHU/build/**/*.* js3party
scripts.import-rhu: npx rimraf node_modules/@types/rhu/ && npx copyfiles -u 5 ../../RHU/@types/rhu/**/*.* node_modules/@types/rhu
scripts.import-js3party: npx rimraf build/js3party/ && npx copyfiles -u 1 js3party/**/*.* build/js3party/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run transpile && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: npx copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html src/**/*.css src/**/*.js build/
